thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: Gordon Parkinson
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Gordon Parkinson

author: Gordon Parkinson
title: Gordon Parkinson
text:
I am very impressed with the Solar Quote: s site - full of informative information with lots of technical information (and a good sens of humour), all made easily accessible to the specialist and non-specialist alike.
As well as providing valuable information and insights on the site itself, after I requested Quote: s three companies contacted me and came to look at our house very quickly, and I am impressed with all of them. Interestingly, they all recommended slightly different configurations of solar panels and inverters, and Finn has been very helpful in helping me choose between them.
If you are thinking of investing in solar PV, I strongly recommend you contact Solar Quote: s first.
